answerText: The New York Trilogy[10] The New York Trilogy was written by this author, who also authored the novels The Brooklyn Follies and Moon Palace.
heading: VCU Closed |2013 | Maryland A and Ohio State A | 21 | Literature | American | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: The first novel in this series centers on Daniel Quinn, who interacts with both the literal author of this series, as well as an unnamed "author." For 10 points each: [10] Name this detective series made up of City of Glass, as well as Ghosts and a novel about a man who replaces his friend Fanshawe in his family and steals his creative work after he dies, The Locked Room.
